author: Ubisoft
description:
Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora "3rd-Person Update", coming December 5, 2025. 

Experience Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora from a new perspective: Third-Person Mode, New Game+, and more, available in the next game update on December 5, 2025.

Discover Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - From the Ashes, a new action-adventure expansion inspired by the new Avatar: Fire and Ash film, coming December 19, 2025.

About Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora:
Set after the events of the first Avatar film, you’ll embark on a journey across the Western Frontier, a never-before-seen continent of Pandora, as you join other Na’vi clans to protect Pandora from the formidable forces of the RDA. 

#Ubisoft #AvatarFrontiers

Learn more about Ubisoft: www.ubisoftgroup.com

title: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora: Third-person Update Trailer

author: Ubisoft
description: Get ready to see Pandora from a whole new angle. The third-person update is coming to Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora, free for all players on December 5, 2025.
title: Get ready to see Pandora from a whole new angle
